tool_description: An API showing all the latest Covid news from Romanian newspapers
name: Stiri Covid
title: Stiri Covid

api_list.name: Get Individual Covid Source News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns Covid news from a specific newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stiri-covid.p.rapidapi.com/covid/biziday"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stiri-covid.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stiri-covid.p.rapidapi.com/covid/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stiri-covid.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Covid News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Covid from the majority of newspapers in Romania
api_list.code:
